name: Spades - Offline
description:
The most popular card game Spades is now ready for iOS mobile phones and tablets with its high quality. Download now and play free. You can play free Spades - Offline in anywhere you want. No need to the internet connection. You can beat artificial intelligence if and only if you are a good Spades player.

Spades Offline brings this classic 4-player contract trick taking card game to App Store, with the high quality of SNG Games. The main contribution of our game is playing offline Spades plus its challenging opponents with high level artificial intelligence, classy graphics and smooth game play.

Contact our Five Star support and feel free to leave your comments about “Spades Offline”:
support@sngict.com
